Welcome to my research website.

Transcriptomic profile analysis for hybrid abalone (*Haliotis fulges* x *H. rufescens*; RG) and pure abalone (*H. rufescens* x *H. rufescens*; RR)) after 90 days exposed to two different diets consisting on:

-   *Macrocisystis*
-   *Navicula + Ulva*
